original_text:
Thus they became unclean by their acts,
    and played the whore in their deeds.
korean_text: 그들은 그들의 행위로 더러워지니 그들의 행동이 음탕하도다

sentences.original_text: Thus they became unclean by their acts,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그들은 그들의 행위로 부정하게 되었다.

sentences.original_text: and played the whore in their deeds.
